text: Nuzvid mandal is one of the 50 mandals in Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is under the administration of Nuzvid revenue division, with headquarters at Nuzvid. The mandal is bounded by Reddigudem, Vissannapeta, Chatrai, Mylavaram Agiripalli, Bapulapadu and Musunuru mandals. == Administration == The mandal is partially a part of the Andhra Pradesh Capital Region under the jurisdiction of APCRDA. == Settlements == Nuzvid mandal consists of 25 villages. title: Nuzvid mandal
